transcript.title: PM 40/1960 - Inquiry into Wool Marketing
transcript.content:
P. M. No. 40/ 1960

Statement by the Prime Minister, the Rt. Hon. R. G. MenziesÂ Having regard to the importance of the wool industry,Â the Commonweal th Government has agreed to the request of allÂ the wool growing organisations that the Government shouldÂ arrange an inquiry into the present methods of marketingÂ wool.

The terms of reference of the committee of inquiryÂ will need careful study, and the Government will requireÂ time to appoint competent and available persons to serve onÂ the proposed committee.

The composition of the committee and its terms ofÂ reference will be announced as soon as possible.

CANBERRA,
28th October, 1960.
